name: Order Cancel Request
purpose: Request cancellation of all remaining quantity on an existing order.

41.name: OrigClOrdID
41.role: ClOrdID of the last accepted order to be canceled

11.name: ClOrdID
11.role: New id for this cancel request (must be unique)

constraints.explain: Cancel requests need OrigClOrdID (target), new ClOrdID (this request), Side, and TransactTime.

constraints.rule: Instrument on cancel must match original orderâ€™s instrument.

constraints.explain: Cancel is a separate entity and must have a unique id.

responses_expected.execReport: PendingCancel (ExecType='6') unless immediately Canceled (ExecType='4'), else OrderCancelReject (9).
